info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 7 at 3:08PM EDT until April 16 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana...
Wabash River.
Wildcat Creek near Lafayette.
.Lowland flooding has developed along the length of the Wabash River due to rainfall of generally three to eight inches in the Wabash basin. Significant flooding is expected to develop on the lower Wabash at Mount Carmel. The crest on the Wabash was near Montezuma Monday afternoon and is expected to reach Riverton Thursday morning and Mount Carmel on Sunday.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site.
* WHEN...Until Wednesday, April 16.
* IMPACTS...At 22.8 feet, Flooding extends to what is locally called River Road in several areas. River Road is the rural way south from Hutsonville to Palestine. Flooding in this area affects large expanses of agricultural land, river cabins and hunting areas on both sides of the river. Most local, unimproved roads leading towards the river are flooded. These roads led to farms, river cabins, private residences, levees and a few oil wells.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.6 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday, April 16. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued Tuesday morning by around 615 AM EDT /515 AM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY, APRIL 16

area.areaDesc: Crawford, IL; Lawrence, IL; Knox, IN; Sullivan, IN
